snippet: Prosecutors said the nine intelligence agents used Internet postings to attack the domestic opposition as South Koreans prepared to vote for president.
abstract: Prosecutors accuse nine South Korean intelligence agents of writing more than 5,000 posts on the Internet in psychological warfare campaign against North Korea since 2009, using some of them to attack domestic opposition before South Korea's presidential election in 2012.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said the nine intelligence agents used Internet postings to attack the domestic opposition as South Koreans prepared to vote for president.

headline.main: South Korean Intelligence Agents Accused of Tarring Opposition Online Before Election
headline.print_headline: South Korean Intelligence Agents Accused of Tarring Opposition Online Before Election
